name: Mamoswine
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: Any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent’s {R} or {W} Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Primordial Boom
attacks.effect: If you have a Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage. If your opponent has a Stadium card in play, heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.
